meta.title: Your Profile
meta.description: View and manage your profile information

profileForm.title: Profile Information
profileForm.description: Update your personal information and how others see you on the platform
profileForm.nameDescription: This is your public display name
profileForm.nameRequired: Name must be at least 2 characters
profileForm.bioPlaceholder: Tell us a bit about yourself
profileForm.bioDescription: Brief description for your profile. URLs are hyperlinked.
profileForm.bioTooLong: Bio must be less than 160 characters
profileForm.locationTooLong: Location must be less than 100 characters
profileForm.profileUpdated: Your profile has been successfully updated
profileForm.errorOccurred: An error occurred while updating your profile

meta.title: Account Settings
meta.description: Manage your account preferences and settings

general.title: General Settings
general.languageDescription: The language used throughout the platform
general.themeDescription: Set the theme for the user interface
general.autoplayVideosDescription: Automatically play videos when browsing content
general.showCodeLineNumbersDescription: Display line numbers in code snippets
general.settingsUpdated: Your settings have been successfully updated
general.errorOccurred: An error occurred while updating your settings

notifications.title: Notification Settings
notifications.newContentDescription: Notify me when new content is published
notifications.contentUpdatesDescription: Notify me when content I've viewed is updated
notifications.commentsDescription: Notify me about replies to my comments
notifications.mentionsDescription: Notify me when I'm mentioned in comments
notifications.newsletterDescription: Receive our weekly newsletter with the latest updates
notifications.settingsUpdated: Your notification settings have been successfully updated
notifications.errorOccurred: An error occurred while updating your notification settings

account.exportDataDescription: Download a copy of your personal data
account.dataExported: Your data has been exported successfully
account.errorExporting: An error occurred while exporting your data
account.dangerZoneDescription: Permanently delete your account and all your data
account.deleteAccountWarningTitle: Warning: This action cannot be undone
account.deleteAccountWarningDescription: Once you delete your account, all of your data will be permanently removed. This action cannot be undone.
account.confirmDeleteDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove all your data from our servers.
account.accountDeletedDescription: Your account has been successfully deleted
account.errorDeleting: An error occurred while deleting your account
account.emailMismatchDescription: The email you entered doesn't match your account email
